turns.speaker: user

turns.utterance: Okay, well, I was parked on the street, and the sign said 'No parking between 8 am and 10 am'. I got there at 8:05 am, and the ticket was issued at 8:07 am! Seriously, that's ridiculous! I was only there for a few minutes.

turns.speaker: agent
